src:
15 Penerbangan Sriwijaya Air Hari Ini Dibatalkan
07 Nov 2019, 10:34 by Trio Hamdani


Foto: Dok. AP II

Jakarta - Pengelola Bandara Soekarno-Hatta (Soetta), PT Angkasa Pura II mencatat 15 penerbangan Sriwijaya Air hari ini dibatalkan. Itu berdasarkan update per pukul 17.00 WIB.Senior Manager of Branch Communication & Legal Bandara Soetta Angkasa Pura II, Febri Toga Simatupang mengatakan, semula ada 11 penerbangan yang telah di-cancel. Namun pukul 5 sore ini jumlahnya bertambah lagi 4 penerbangan."Berdasarkan data kami ada 11 penerbangan yang sudah di-cancel terlebih dahulu, terus 7 yang rencananya akan terbang dan untuk pukul 5 (sore) yang terlapor 4 penerbangan sudah cancel," kata dia saat dihubungi detikcom, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Empat penerbangan yang menyusul dibatalkan adalah tujuan Tanjung Pandan, Bengkulu, Lampung, dan Malang."Empat penerbangan itu sudah di-cancel juga yang rencananya akan terbang," sebut dia.Saat ini masih ada sisa tiga penerbangan Sriwijaya Air dalam kondisi delay atau tertunda dengan tujuan Pangkal Pinang, Pontianak dan dan Yogyakarta.Simak Video "Ratusan Penumpang Sriwijaya Air Telantar di Bandara Hasanuddin"[Gambas:Video 20detik](toy/eds)
text:
15 Sriwijaya Air Flights Canceled Today
Nov 7 2019, 10:34 by Trio Hamdani


Photo: Doc. AP II

Jakarta - Soekarno-Hatta (Soetta) Airport Manager, PT Angkasa Pura II noted that 15 Sriwijaya Air flights were canceled today. That was based on an update as of 17:00 WIB. Senior Manager of Branch Communication & Legal Soetta Angkasa Pura II Airport, Febri Toga Simatupang said, initially 11 flights had been canceled. But at 5 in the afternoon the number increased again by 4 flights. "Based on our data, there are 11 flights that have been canceled first, then 7 which are planned to fly and for 5 (afternoon), 4 reported flights have been canceled," he said contacted detikcom, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). The four flights that were canceled were the destinations of Tanjung Pandan, Bengkulu, Lampung, and Malang. "The four flights have been canceled as well as those planned to fly," he said. there are still three Sriwijaya Air flights remaining in a delay or delayed destination to Pangkal Pinang, Pontianak and and Yogyakarta. Watch Video "Hundreds of Sriwijaya Air Passengers Neglected at Hasanuddin Airport" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (toy / eds)
